alert.note: Alert for City of Bristol; City of Norton; Lee; Russell; Scott; Washington; Wise (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued May 16 at 4:16PM EDT until May 16 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 225 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN TENNESSEE THIS WATCH INCLUDES 11 COUNTIES IN EAST TENNESSEE ANDERSON CAMPBELL CLAIBORNE GRAINGER HAMBLEN HANCOCK HAWKINS MORGAN SCOTT SULLIVAN UNION IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST VIRGINIA CITY OF BRISTOL CITY OF NORTON LEE RUSSELL SCOTT WASHINGTON WISE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABINGDON, ALPHA, APPALACHIA, ARTHUR, BEAN STATION, BENHAMS, BIG SOUTH FORK NATIONAL, BIG STONE GAP, BRISTOL TN, BRISTOL VA, CARYVILLE, CASTLEWOOD, CLAIRFIELD, CLINTON, COEBURN, DYE, ELGIN, ELK VALLEY, EVANSTON, FINCASTLE, HANSONVILLE, HARROGATE-SHAWANEE, HIGH POINT, HILTONS, HONAKER, HOWARD QUARTER, HUNTSVILLE, JELLICO, KINGSPORT, KYLES FORD, LA FOLLETTE, LEBANON, LONE MOUNTAIN, LUTTRELL, MAYNARDVILLE, MOORESBURG, MORRISTOWN, NORMA, NORRIS LAKE, NORTON, OAK RIDGE, ONEIDA, PARDEE, PAULETTE, PETROS, PINE ORCHARD, ROSE HILL, ROSE HILL, ROSEDALE, ROYAL BLUE, RUSSELLVILLE, SANDLICK, SHARPS CHAPEL, SLICK ROCK, SMOKEY JUNCTION, SNEEDVILLE, SOUTH HOLSTON DAM, SPRINGDALE, TREADWAY, WHITE OAK, AND WISE.
